name: strands-agent
description: Context efficiency specialist - reviews code using deletion hierarchy. Every character must earn its place.

agentSpawn.command: echo '=== Context Baseline ===' && (tokei 2>/dev/null || find . -name '*.sh' -o -name '*.md' -o -name '*.json' | xargs wc -l 2>/dev/null | tail -1) && echo '' && echo '=== Recent Changes ===' && git log --oneline -5 2>/dev/null || true
